dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C4176697S] Copyright violations by Orchestr8, LLC on your system
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

Please visit our web site at
www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Infringeme
nt%2001%2015%2007%20FINAL.pdf
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----
From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Saturday, May 19, 2007 1:53 PM
To: Copyright
Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C4176697S] Copyright violations by Orchestr8,
LLC on your system

==== Forwarded Ticket ====
1. Copyright violations by Orchestr8, LLC on your system
Added by system at Saturday, May 19 2007 06:52 pm 
X-MailFrom: kphillips@dogbitelaw.com 
X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net 
Received: from [216.12.192.67] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for
<abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net>; Sat May 19 18:52:22 2007

Delivered-To: abuse@inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net

  by inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net with SMTP; 19 May 2007 23:52:21 -0000

smtp01.theplanet.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830);

Return-path: <kphillips@dogbitelaw.com>

helo=mx02.filter.theplanet.com)

 with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) 
 (Exim)

kphillips@dogbitelaw.com) 
        with smtp (Exim) 
        id 1HpYiU-000J5c-5N 
        for abuse@theplanet.com; Sat, 19 May 2007 18:52:06 -0500 
Received: from 76.168.247.180 ([76.168.247.180]) by dogbitelaw.com for
<abuse@theplanet.com>; Sat, 19 May 2007 16:52:02 -0700 
Message-ID: <464F8D9D.7000301@dogbitelaw.com> 
Date: Sat, 19 May 2007 16:51:57 -0700 
From: Kenneth Phillips <kphillips@dogbitelaw.com> 
User-Agent: Thunderbird 1.5.0.10 (Windows/20070221) 
MIME-Version: 1.0 
To:  abuse@theplanet.com 
Subject: Copyright violations by Orchestr8, LLC on your system 
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=ISO-8859-1; format=flowed 
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit 
X-OriginalArrivalTime: 19 May 2007 23:52:18.0424 (UTC)
FILETIME=[BBFC5780:01C79A70] 

MIME element (text/plain) 
Dear Sirs: 
 
I am an attorney in Los Angeles, and the author and copyright owner of  
www.dogbitelaw.com, and all of the content on that website. 
 
It came to my attention today that one of your clients has copied my  
entire website and is retransmitting it at the following URL: 
 
http://www.dogbitelaw.com.health.u.orch8.net/ 
 
This copying and retransmission of the content of www.dogbitelaw.com has

occurred and continues to occur without my permission. Consequently, it

violates my rights under the Copyright Law and under other provisions of

law. 
 
I obtained the following information from WHOIS: 
 
Registrant: 
   Orchestr8, LLC 
   3773 Cherry Creek North Dr. 
   Suite 575 
   Denver, Colorado 80209 
   United States 
 
   Registered through: GoDaddy.com, Inc. (http://www.godaddy.com) 
   Domain Name: ORCH8.NET 
    Created on: 06-Mar-06 
    Expires on: 06-Mar-08 
    Last Updated on: 29-Jan-07 
 
   Administrative Contact: 
    Turner, Elliot  Whois Privacy and Spam Prevention by DomainTools.com

    Orchestr8, LLC 
    3773 Cherry Creek North Dr. 
    Suite 575 
    Denver, Colorado 80209 
    United States 
    (303) 733-1026 
 
   Technical Contact: 
    Turner, Elliot  Whois Privacy and Spam Prevention by DomainTools.com

    Orchestr8, LLC 
    3773 Cherry Creek North Dr. 
    Suite 575 
    Denver, Colorado 80209 
    United States 
    (303) 733-1026 
 
   Domain servers in listed order: 
    NS0.DNSMADEEASY.COM 
    NS1.DNSMADEEASY.COM 
 
I also obtained the following information about the registrant: 
 
Registrant: 
    Orchestr8, LLC 
 
    Registered through: GoDaddy.com, Inc. (http://www.godaddy.com) 
    Domain Name: ORCH8.NET 
 
    Domain servers in listed order: 
       NS0.DNSMADEEASY.COM 
       NS1.DNSMADEEASY.COM 
 
It is my intention to assert all of my remedies against Orchestr8, LLC  
and all parties who aid, abet, conspire or assist that company or any  
other party. 
 
By permitting Orchestr8, LLC to operate on your system, you share  
responsibility for any such violations. 
 
Demand is made that you immediately cease and desist from the above  
described actions which are violative of my rights. 
 
Please advise immediately as to what measure if any you intend to take  
against Orchestr8, LLC. 
 
Govern yourselves accordingly. 
 
Sincerely, 
 
Kenneth Phillips 
 
 
--  
NOTE: Because I cannot retain e-mail from the public, it is essential  
that you click on "reply" if you write back to me, so I will be able to

review our prior messages and respond again. 
 
+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ 
 
Kenneth M. Phillips, Attorney at Law 
       kphillips@dogbitelaw.com 
          www.dogbitelaw.com 
 
+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
